info.title: Your API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for your Laravel project

201.description: User registered successfully, verification email sent

post.summary: Authenticate a user and return a token
post.description: Logs in a user with email and password, returning a Sanctum token if credentials are valid and email is verified.

message.description: Welcome message with user's full name

error.description: Error message for invalid credentials or unverified email

post.description: Updates the authenticated user's profile, including an optional profile picture upload.

items.example: The full name must be a string.
The email has already been taken.
The picture must be an image.

400.description: Validation error or incorrect current password

get.description: Retrieves a list of all categories.

post.description: Creates a validated order immediately for a single product, bypassing the cart.

product_id.description: The ID of the product to purchase

post.description: Adds a product to an unvalidated order (cart). If an unvalidated order exists, adds the product to it; otherwise, creates a new order.

product_id.description: The ID of the product to add

put.description: Validates an unvalidated cart (order) by setting it to validated and updating its status to processing.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The ID of the order to validate

404.description: Order not found or not eligible for validation

get.description: Retrieves the authenticated user's current cart with items.
Retrieves all public products with their pictures.

pictures[].description: Array of product images (JPEG, PNG, JPG, max 2MB each)

get.description: Retrieves a single product by its ID, including associated images.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the product to retrieve

pictures[].description: Array of product images (JPEG, PNG, JPG, max 2MB each)

images_to_delete[].description: Array of image IDs to delete

example.price: The price must be a number.

get.description: Retrieves all public products filtered by a single supplier sub-type (workshop, importer, or merchant).
Retrieves a public product with its supplier information by ID.
Retrieves the supplier information for a public product by ID.

post.description: Creates a new project for a specified service provider owned by the authenticated user, with optional image uploads stored locally in the project_pictures table.

parameters.name: serviceProvider
parameters.description: The ID of the service provider to associate the project with

pictures.description: Array of image files to upload

service_provider_id.description: Optional service provider ID (overrides URL parameter if provided)

message.example: Not authorized to create projects for this service provider

delete.description: Deletes a project and its associated pictures for the authenticated user, if they own the associated service provider.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to delete

message.example: Not authorized to delete this project

post.description: Creates a new service provider for the authenticated user, assigning a domain and skills.

description.example: Experienced web developer specializing in e-commerce solutions

skill_ids.description: Array of skill IDs to associate with the provider

description.example: Experienced web developer specializing in e-commerce solutions

post.summary: Upload Pictures for a Service Provider
post.description: Uploads a list of images for a service provider, stores them locally, and saves their paths in the service_provider_pictures table.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the service provider to associate the pictures with

pictures.description: Array of image files to upload

message.example: Not authorized to upload pictures for this service provider

delete.description: Deletes a service provider and its associated skills and pictures for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the service provider to delete

message.example: Not authorized to delete this service provider

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of skills.
Retrieves a paginated list of skill domains.
Retrieves a supplier by its ID, including associated user, domain, and type (workshop, importer, or merchant).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the supplier to retrieve

picture.description: Image file for supplier profile (JPEG, PNG, JPG, max 2MB)

example.business_name: The business_name must be a string.

get.description: Retrieves all suppliers associated with a specific user by their user ID, including their associated domain data.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose suppliers are to be retrieved

404.description: No suppliers found for the user

message.example: No suppliers found for this user

picture.description: Image file for supplier profile (JPEG, PNG, JPG, max 2MB)

get.description: Retrieves all products associated with a specific supplier by their ID, including product images.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the supplier whose products are to be retrieved
